SayDo.description: A list of up to 10 different statements describing what the persona says and does.

items.description: An action or statement of the persona.

See.description: A list of up to 10 different viewpoints of the persona.

Pains.description: A list of up to 10 different challenges or frustrations of the persona.

items.description: A challenge or frustration of the persona.

ThinkFeel.description: A list of up to 10 different things the persona thinks and feels.

items.description: A thought or feeling of the persona.

Hear.description: A list of up to 10 different things the persona usually hears in a day.

Gains.description: A list of up to 10 different benefits or aspirations of the persona.

items.description: A benefit or aspiration of the persona.
